About Naval

I picked out some of my favorite responses on advice to younger self, thinking, time vs money, relationships, reading, stress, and health.

Q: â€œHow to stay positive during debilitating sickness?â€

Q: â€œWhat do you do if you get stressed out and want to regain focus?â€
